title: Bending
fullText:
The radius of every bend in a wiring system shall be such that conductors and cables will not suffer damage.
Bends in rigid conduit shall be such that the internal diameter is not significantly reduced.
Changes of direction in trunking, ducts or similar applications shall permit the bending of cables laid therein, so as to comply with the requirements of this Clause.
NOTE: See Clause 3.9.6 for cable-bending requirements.
